# Lot 3, Prince Edward Island

Lot 3 is a township in Prince County, Prince Edward Island, Canada created during the 1764–1766 survey of Samuel Holland.  It is part of North Parish.
Population
|1871|1149
|1881|1355
|1891|1412
|1901|1439
|1911|1298
|1921|1042
|1931|899

|1996|893
|2001|864
|2006|899
}}
Communities
Incorporated municipalities:
* Greenmount-Montrose
Civic address communities:
* Alma
* Central Kildare
* Elmsdale
* Greenmount
* Huntley
* Kildare Capes
* Lauretta
* Montrose
* Roseville
* St. Edward
* St. Lawrence
* Woodvale
History
The township went through various owners under feudalism when Prince Edward Island was a British colony prior to Canadian Confederation:
* Chauncy Townsend, Esq. (M.P.).[http://www.islandregister.com/proprietors.html] (1767-1810)
*   Various.[http://www.islandregister.com/proprietors1838.html] (1838)
* Benj. Bowring, Esq., Jas. Yeo, Esq., and others.[http://www.islandregister.com/hutchinson.html] (1864)
